data: British cruiser | St. Kitts | Government House | Basse Terre
St. Kitts harbor | Government House | Basse Terre
THE entrance of a British cruiser into the harbor of St. Kitts was always followed by a ball at Government House in the little capital of Basse Terre.
Julia France and Her Times: A Novel
